appear common rule cujus est solum ejus est usque ad coelum thereby owner may build upon part ground even though detriment neighbour prospect light yet man may dispose upon ground put positive gathering water natural way make fall together upon neighbour ground otherwayes neighbour might take away profit pleasure neighbour tenement closs spout kennel carrying rain water thereupon abundance
